title: Adobe Campaign ExperienceEvent - Profile Snapshot Owning Entities
description: Adobe Campaign ExperienceEvent optional snapshot of Profile owning entities.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: A single message sent to a recipient.

xdm:profileSnapshot.title: Profile Snapshot
xdm:profileSnapshot.description: Profile Snapshot contains the recipient of the message. This property is primarily used to link the message to a Profile using the `IdentityMap` but it can also be used to freeze some properties of the profile at the time the message was sent.

xdm:orgUnit.title: Organizational Unit
xdm:orgUnit.description: The unit within the organization owning the profile. This can be used to reference the organization details maintained in another dataset.

xdm:geoUnit.title: Geographical Unit
xdm:geoUnit.description: The geographical unit within the organization owning the profile. This can be used to reference the geographical information maintained in another dataset.
